title: Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old, avis décès, necrologie, obituary
text: Parcourez la nécrologie de Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old résidant dans la province Manitoba pour le détail des funérailles. Bonnie Roberts Obituary In Loving Memory of Bonnie Roberts (nee Yeo) age 81 Lovingly remembered by her children Laurie Young (Calvin), Brett Roberts (Justina Johnson) and Leslie Allen (Chris Jackson), 12 grandchildren and her 9 great-grandchildren. Bonnie was predeceased by her husband Meredith Roberts. Died August 24, 2024 Bayside Personal Care Home Killarney, Manitoba Celebration of Life Saturday, September 21, 2024 Lakeview Community Church Killarney, Manitoba 2:00 p.m. Interment ~ Killarney Cemetery Donations in memory of Bonnie may be made to the Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation; 304-1 Wesley Avenue Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 4C6 To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Bonnie Jean (Yeo) Roberts, please visit our floral store. Read More September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old Nos plus sincères sympathies à la famille et aux amis de Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old.. Décès pour la Ville: Killarney, Province: Manitoba avis deces Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old necrologie Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old Nous offrons nos plus sincères condoléances à la famille et aux amis de Bonnie Jean Yeo Roberts September 21 1942 August 24 2024 81 Years Old et espérons que leur mémoire pourra être une source de réconfort pendant cette période difficile. Vos pensées et vos mots aimables sont grandement appréciés.
